attributes.action: Ban polystyrene plates, cups and bowls.
attributes.additional_details: We are one of the world's worst countries for producing single use plastic waste, this would be a step in the right direction. There are plenty of inexpensive alternatives to plastic picnic plates cups and bowls.
attributes.background: Please introduce a ban on polystyrene and other disposable plastic plates, cups and bowls - equivalent to the ban on plastic straws. Thank you!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586547
